creditline: Gift of Leo and Doris Hodroff
description: iron-red, gilt, black and green; central scene with Dutch couple and dog in a fenced garden; border of underglaze blue lappets issuing floral sprigs alternating with auspicious and antique objects; two pairs of flower boughs on exteriors
object_name: Charger with Dutch figures in garden setting
title: Charger with Dutch figures in garden setting
